bug.author: we-taper
bug.description: I think the doc-string <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/2b96f3662bd776e277f86997659e61046b56c315/tensorflow/python/ops/math_ops.py#L2758>here</denchmark-link> : `output[i, j, k, ..., l] = trace(x[i, j, i, ..., l, :, :])` should be: `output[i, j, k, ..., l] = trace(x[i, j, k, ..., l, :, :])`

comments.comment: Hi, Can I create a PR to fix this?
Closing this issue as this was resolved. The corresponding PR was merged already. Thanks!
